data.message: Is there a way to NOT see everything a person likes or reacts to on Facebook? It clogs up the feed of the things you want to see :-)

replies.message: Hey Teressa. There are a number of different story types in News Feed, including stories about your friends’ activity on Facebook. We look at many factors to make sure the most relevant stories appear in News Feed, including how you have interacted with similar posts in the past. If you don’t want to see stories from a specific friend, you can unfollow them. Learn how at: http://bit.ly/29O2RpI. -Jordan
